Job Posting: 177941 - Position: S26 Software Quality Assurance Engineer - Co- op 177941B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/09/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 02/02/2026 01:33 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Rakuten Kobo Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description Job Description: 2026 - Summer S26 Software Quality Assurance Engineer - Co-op 177941B Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 8 or 12 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Here at Rakuten Kobo Inc., our mission is to make reading lives better. We offer a start-up environment, interesting and engaging work within the technology and publishing industries, and a group of friendly and talented individuals. Whether you are a student at the start of your career or a professional carving a different path, our early career opportunities are built with you in mind-with experiences tailored to your individual skills and interests. If you are looking for a company that inspires passion and personal and professional growth, come join Kobo and come help us make reading lives better. About Rakuten Kobo Inc. Rakuten Kobo Inc. is the world's digital bookseller created by and for booklovers. Owned by Tokyo-based Rakuten Group, Inc. and headquartered in Toronto, Rakuten Kobo's millions of worldwide users can read anytime, anywhere, and on any device. With a mission to make reading lives better for all, Rakuten Kobo connects readers to stories using thoughtful and personalized curation of eBooks and audiobooks, and the best dedicated eReaders and apps for reading. With the singular focus of making reading lives the best they can be, Kobo's open platform allows people to fit reading into more moments in their busy lives. To learn more about Rakuten Kobo, visit www.kobo.com. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received.Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
